official_title: Concurrent resolution designating June 6 of each year as "Liberation Day."

summary.text: Designates June 6 of each year as "Liberation Day" in remembrance of the United States' role in preserving freedom for Europe and the free world.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution designating June 6 of each year as "Liberation Day."
